name: Charlotte Brulee
text: [Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] If your Leader has the {Big Mom Pirates} type, when a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Big Mom Pirates} type, when a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
